title: 1909 T205 Russell "Lena" Blackburne Error/Ghost SOLD (First sale on net54)!
author: soccersaver97

posts.post_title: 1909 T205 Russell "Lena" Blackburne Error/Ghost SOLD (First sale on net54)!
posts.post_content: I have scans available through email! PM me any offers (I won't be offended by any price). There is a ghost image on the player's left side. It is difficult to see, but the scans might help. Also, the back shows the red diamond that appears on the front of the card.
Just sold it to Andrew! First sale on net54!

Congrats on your first sale and to Andrew on the pickup. I don't currently collect T205's, but this one caught my eye!  


Sent from my iPhone using [URL=http://tapatalk.com/m?id=1]Tapatalk[/URL]
